languages.text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} совершает {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный{/g} выстрел в {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженную{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенную{/g} цель, он получает потраченные очки действия обратно, а атака не входит в лимит атак на ход. Действует не более 1 раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy in a 10-cell radius around the Hunter becomes immobilised or stunned, they perform a single attack against that enemy, if possible.
When the Hunter performs a single-shot attack on an immobilized or stunned target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per round.

When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}对{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}目标进行{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}时，此次攻击的耗费会全部返还，且此次攻击不计入攻击次数上限。此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能触发一次。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当猎人对定身或眩晕目标进行{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发{/g}攻击时，此次攻击的耗费会全部返还，且此次攻击不计入攻击次数上限。此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能触发一次。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} efectúe un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} contra un objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, este ataque devuelve los puntos que ha costado y además no cuenta para el límite de ataques. Límite de una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} efectúe un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} contra un objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, este ataque devuelve los puntos que ha costado y además no cuenta para el límite de ataques. Límite de una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff auf ein {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmtes{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubtes{/g} Ziel ausführt, erstattet dieser Angriff seine Kosten zurück und zählt nicht für das Angriffslimit. Einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff auf ein {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmtes{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubtes{/g} Ziel ausführt, erstattet dieser Angriff seine Kosten zurück und zählt nicht für das Angriffslimit. Einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} lance une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} sur une cible {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisée{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdie{/g}, le coût de l'attaque est remboursé et elle n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques. Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Chasseur lance une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g} sur une cible immobilisée ou étourdie, le coût de l'attaque est remboursé et elle n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques. Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}中のターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}攻撃を行った時、この攻撃のコストが返還され、攻撃回数制限にカウントされない。{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに1回しか発動しない。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ハンターが移動不可またはスタン中のターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}攻撃を行った時、この攻撃のコストが返還され、攻撃回数制限にカウントされない。{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}ごとに1回しか発動しない。

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} совершает {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночный{/g} выстрел в {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженную{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенную{/g} цель, он получает потраченные очки действия обратно, а атака не входит в лимит атак на ход. Действует не более 1 раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} target, this attack refunds its cost and does not count for the attack limit. Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда охотник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночный выстрел{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженную{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенную{/g} цель, он получает потраченные {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действия{/g} обратно, а атака не входит в лимит атак на ход. Действует не более 1 раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Когда охотник совершает {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночный выстрел{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженную{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушенную{/g} цель, он получает потраченные {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действия{/g} обратно, а атака не входит в лимит атак на ход. Действует не более 1 раза за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
